resetPasswordScreen.context: Enter your email and we'll send you the password reset instructions

verifyPhone.context: We have sent a One Time Password (OTP) one to your phone. Enter it to complete sign up
verifyPhone.changePhoneNumber: Want to use a different phone number?

campaignDetail.bidInfo:
A bid is the price you are willing to do a campaign at. Please choose this wisely. Too high, and the brands will not want to negotiate either, thinking it is a non-serious bid.  Remember, multiple influencers/creators may be interested in the same campaigns. 

May the odds be ever in your favor!
